reviewText: My students and I truly enjoyed this film. Love it!
This is a great video series to teach my kids. I always let my kids watch these on Sunday afternoons. I would recommend these to any parent.

This was entertaining and OK but I wish it had more "meat" to it.  They could have included a lot more factual information about Pasteur and his work.  I was a little disappointed that it was not more factual.
